name: Naked Story (Sports Festival Ver)
description:
遊戲支持“簡體中文”。
如果將Steam的語言設置更改為“簡體中文”，則可以下載它。

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In response to many requests, the CG collection released in Japan has been restructured as a game.
The illustrations used in this game are illustrations arranged from [NakedStory].
It is reconstructed as a new exposure situation using the arranged illustrations.

New illustrations are also included.
The heroine voice (Japanese only) has been newly added.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The basic rule is simple, same as Minesweeper.
When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Erroneously detect by security software.]


Because this product is an original program, security software may find false positives.
This product is simply a game and the program is safe, so please disregard such warnings.
Please add it to your security software's safe list if this poses a problem.
https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=4361-MVDP-3638&l=english

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [Trial version] [/] [/]

Search for a trial version at [DLsite].

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Characters are all adults.]


This is a fictional story. Everything does not really exist.
Characters are all adults.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[If an error occurs.]


Please install the [Japanese language pack].
[Settings] -> [Time & Language] -> [Region & Language] -> [Add a Language] -> [Japanese]
